alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 10:25AM EST until January 12 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... Northeastern Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... Southern Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 1045 AM EST. * At 1024 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mount Olive, or near Beattyville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mary around 1035 AM EST. Hollonville around 1040 AM EST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Simpson. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
